content.icerik: Intense Hydrating & Nourishing Face Cream This protecting & hydrating face cream with UV-protection is formulated for young and normal skin. Planell-oil supports the skin’s natural lipid layers, Pentavitin® moisturizes the skin. The vegetal anti-oxidant complex in its formula protects the skin against premature skin-aging, caused by free-radicals. Peptamide-6 increases skin firmness.Applied regularly the skin becomes soft, smooth and luminous.
